message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product at a competitive price of $11,500. I believe this product will be very valuable for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,800. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but the product's value is quite high. I could meet you halfway at $11,100.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I can offer $10,900 for the product. That's as low as I'm willing to go.
